title: GUYS I NEED HELP AFTER THE NEW PATCH (you have disconnected please check your internet connection )
body:
HEY GUYS

I NEED HELP AFTER THE NEW PATCH UPDATE >> IT Downloaded and installed fine

BUT WHEN the game lunch after the teams queue it stays at 0% and never going just stay at 0% And after 1 min it says you have disconnected please check your internet connection and try again

i did every thing i could >> i deleted the game and installed it again and turned off the modem , restart the pc

checked the firewall and antivirus

please i need help i can join any game + i got banned 20 min afk :(

replies.body:
Since patches only change local files inside the League installation folder, it's *extremely unlikely* to have affected your connection. The issue you're describing is generally a result of your client not being able to establish a stable connection to the server. I recommend taking a look at the steps on our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to start working towards a solution on this.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.

the game works at it self :D

THX
